H0.text: What is the collective noun for a group of badgers. Clan

H1.text: What is the collective noun for a group of badgers. Pack

H2.text: What is the collective noun for a group of badgers. Sett

H3.text: What is the collective noun for a group of badgers. Çetë

A4.text: badger colonies are more often called clans

A5.text: A collective name suggested for a group of colonial badgers is a cete
